p: A pseudotyped-lentiviral-vector-based neutralization assay to measure specific NAbs in plasma from recovered patients with SARS-CoV-2 showed variations in NAbs titers, approximately 30% of patients did not develop high NAbs titers after infection [ 61]. These variations are associated with age, lymphocyte count, and C reactive protein levels in blood, suggesting that other components from plasma contribute to the recovery of these patients.
